problem.markdown:
Please determine if the statement is true or false:
>> "In the Normally distributed demand graph, the normal distribution can be negative, whereas demand for newspaper will not be negative. The normal distribution is only a good approximation if the mean of the distribution is much greater than the standard deviation. In this way, the probability of normal distribution predicting a negative demand is very small." <<
(x) True. ( ) False.
